QuoteLineItemGroupClass.name: QuoteLineItemGroupClass
QuoteLineItemGroupClass.description: Represents the association of a Quote Line Item to GroupClass. Use this entity for large group quoting process when multiple group classes are attributed on a single quote line item. Child object of Quote.

GroupClassId.description: The group class associated with the quote and quote line item.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view.

Name.description: The name of the quote line item group class.

QuoteLineItemId.description: The quote line item associated with the quote line item group class.
